1370: Gheesen was born in Appel Marckt in 1370.
Got married to Boidin at age 24 in 1370.
Gave birth to Hildebrandus in 1370 at age 24.
1386: Died while giving birth to bertrade in 1386 at age 40.
1371: Gave birth to Suaneka in 1371 at age 25.
1374: Gave birth to Linnea in 1374 at age 28.
1375: Gave birth to Beatrice in 1375 at age 29.
1376: Gave birth to Myrthel in 1376 at age 30.
1379: Gave birth to Ymmekine in 1379 at age 33.
Lost daughter Ymmekine when Ymmekine was 1 years old.
1380: Gave birth to Nellen in 1380 at age 34.
